com.xceptance.xlt.common.util.action.validation

Class URLActionDataResponseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.common.util.action.validation.URLActionDataResponseHandler

  • public class URLActionDataResponseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handling the Response in form of a URLActionDataResult for a request described by a URLActionData.
    Automatically handles the response when handleUrlActionResponse() is called.
    Author:
    matthias mitterreiter

    • Constructor Detail

      • URLActionDataResponseHandler

        public URLActionDataResponseHandler(URLActionDataStoreResponseHandler storeHandler,
                            URLActionDataValidationResponseHandler validationHandler)
        Parameters:
        storeHandler - : for selecting elements of the response for dynamic parameter interpretation.
        validationHandler - : for validating the response content.

    • Method Detail

      • handleURLActionResponse

        public void handleURLActionResponse(URLActionData action,
                           URLActionDataExecutableResult result)
        Does the following:
        • Validates the http response code.
        • validates the response content via the store handler.
        • Validates the response content via the validation handle.
        Parameters:
        action - : the URLActionData, that describes the request.
        result - : the URLActionDataExecutableResult, that holds the response data.
